definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery

sentences.english: This grating was nothing else than a piece of the brass screens with which aviaries are covered in menageries .
sentences.chinese: 这个纱罩只不过是块动物园里供蒙鸟笼用的铜纱。

sentences.english: The thrush flew out as soon as the boy opened the cage.
sentences.chinese: 男孩刚一打开鸟笼，画眉鸟就飞出去了。

sentences.english: Would you wear a cage skirt? Totally.
sentences.chinese: 你愿意穿这样的一件鸟笼裙么？

sentences.english: We glitzed up the lobby with a couple of fountains and a bird cage.
sentences.chinese: 我们用一对喷泉和一个鸟笼装饰大厅。

sentences.english: The bird beat its wings against the bars of its cage.
sentences.chinese: 鸟用翅膀扑打着鸟笼的栏杆。

sentences.english: He keeps a parrot in a birdcage in his living room.
sentences.chinese: 他在客厅的鸟笼里养了一只鹦鹉。

sentences.english: We nightingales never sing in a cage.
sentences.chinese: 我们夜莺从来不在鸟笼里唱歌。

sentences.english: Just before lunch, one of my friend's daughters carried a bird cage out into the yard.
sentences.chinese: 午饭前，朋友的孩子拿著一个鸟笼子在玩。

sentences.english: One day no song came up from the little wicker cage.
sentences.chinese: 终于有一天，不再有声音从小柳条鸟笼里传出。

sentences.english: But she must have had one , or why would she have a cage ?
sentences.chinese: 但她一定养了鸟，要不为什么有一只鸟笼呢？

sentences.english: She's the protector of the whole Cage, the one being that keeps Sigil safe.
sentences.chinese: 她是整座鸟笼的守护者，是她保障了印记城的安全。

sentences.english: The poor lark was most unhappy as a prisoner in a cage.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的百灵被关在鸟笼里像囚犯一样不快乐。

sentences.english: He whispered to the parrot, "Now get out." But he was very surprised that the parrot was clinging to the bars of the cage.
sentences.chinese: 但是令他吃惊的是这只鹦鹉竟抓着鸟笼的横木不放。

sentences.english: A man hangs birdcages on branches at a park in Beijing. (March 6, 2011) (Andy Wong/Associated Press)
sentences.chinese: 北京，一个男人把鸟笼挂在公园的树丫上。

sentences.english: Attracted by its beauty, you can catch the bird and put it in a golden cage.
sentences.chinese: 那美吸引着你，你能将它捉住放进金鸟笼里。

sentences.english: Very quickly her drug lord boyfriend locked Guzman in a golden cage.
sentences.chinese: 很快，尤雅娜的毒贩男友将她锁进一个金丝鸟笼里。
